FuncDef: The display mac-address flapping command displays the MAC address flapping configuration, active MAC address flapping records and aged MAC address flapping records. The display mac-address flapping command displays the MAC address flapping configuration, active MAC address flapping records and aged MAC address flapping records.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the MAC address flapping configuration of the specified board.
If this parameter is not specified, the command displays the MAC address flapping configurations of all boards.
-

Indicates the start time of MAC address flapping.
-

Specifies the start date.
The format of the start date is YYYY/MM/DD.

Specifies the start time.
The format of the start  time is HH:MM:SS.

ExtraInfo: You can run the display mac-address flapping command to display the MAC address flapping configuration, active MAC address flapping records and aged MAC address flapping records in the system.
